answers.answer: Are you on a gluten free diet ? If so, that could explain the weight gain.

question: Hello.  I am a 49-year-old woman with type 1 diabetes, thyroiditis, and celiac disease.  I am having severe pain in my hips and am tired all of the time.  My thyroid levels are normal, but I keep having nodes and swollen thyroid.  I am also gaining weight.  I guess my question is:  does anyone else have this combination of problems and what can I do about it?
title: multiple autoimmune disorders
